mapper.sql: id, stock_id, selected_type, status, create_date, update_date
mapper.delete: delete from stock_my_selected where stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and selected_type = #{selectedType,jdbcType=BIGINT}
delete from stock_my_selected where stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and selected_type = #{selectedType,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into stock_my_selected (id, stock_id, selected_type, status, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{selectedType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update stock_my_selected set stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, selected_type = #{selectedType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
